description: The Accounts Receivable Specialist is a key member of the Finance organization and is responsible for processing incoming payments, ensuring that bills are paid in a timely and accurate manner, and maintaining clear records of accounts.
responsibilities: Manage and oversee all aspects of the accounts receivable function. Prepare and distribute invoices to clients and customers. Monitor payments received and reconcile any discrepancies. Track and resolve outstanding payment issues in a timely manner. Maintain detailed records of all transactions and prepare monthly reports for management review. Coordinate with sales and customer service departments to address customer queries and disputes. Apply payments to appropriate accounts and maintain an accurate aging report. Forecast cash inflow to assist with financial planning. Ensure compliance with company policies and industry regulations. Recommend and implement process improvements to optimize the accounts receivable function. Perform other related duties as assigned.

qualifications.required: 3 years of experience working in Accounts Receivable, Experience with Microsoft Excel and ERP System (Sage)
qualifications.preferred: Bachelor Degree is a PLUS, Must be able to work in a team environment, Must have people and communication skills.
